title: jeremypwr
author: jeremypwr
created_time: April 25, 2023, 02:19:57 PMLast edit: April 27, 2023, 09:19:46 PM by jeremypwr
content: UFC Fight Night 223 Multi Master Challenge   Prizes1st place: 2 mbtc Free Bet2nd place: 1 mbtc Free Bet3rd place: 0.5 mbtc Free BetThe Rules are similar to the original Sportsbet.io Multi Master that we all enjoyed so muchRulesa)  Predict the winner of each match (earn 1-2 points)b)  Predict how many matches will NOT go the Full Distance (will be adjusted accordingly if matches get cancelled)Odds @ https://sportsbet.io/sports/mma/ufc/ufc-fight-night-tsarukyan-vs-moicano/matchesMatches(2 points each)12. Yadong Song vs. Ricky Simon11. Caio Borralho vs. Michal Oleksiejczuk10. Rodolfo Vieira vs. Cody Brundage9. Julian Erosa vs. Fernando Padilla8. Marcos Rogerio de Lima vs. Waldo Cortes-Acosta(1 point each)7. Martin Buday vs. Jake Collier6. Natan Levy vs. Pete Rodriguez5. Cody Durden vs. Charles Johnson4.3. Stephanie Egger vs. Irina Alekseeva2. 1. Hailey Cowan vs. Jamey-Lyn HorthNOT go the Full Distance  Make sure your Prediction is in this format  Example12. Yadong Song 11. Caio Borralho 10. Rodolfo Vieira 9. Julian Erosa 8. Marcos Rogerio de Lima 7. Martin Buday 6. Natan Levy 5. Cody Durden 4. 3. Stephanie Egger 2. 1. Hailey Cowan NOT go the Full Distance 4(Small print)* Must be active in Sports betting and/or Sports betting discussion (some exceptions) *** The declared winners are final and up to my discretion **

comments.author: jeremypwr
comments.body: Sportsbet.io has been kind enough to sponsor my Prediction Contests and Promos for a while now.Sportsbet.io is a sports betting website; therefore these Prediction Contests and Promos are catered to those who actually bet on/discuss sports.Given the nature of my threads, please do not bother making a Prediction if you have not read the OP and qualify.If you are unsure if you qualify, just shoot me a PM.   Thank you for your cooperation.
